transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Sir at least boliye madam
Executive: Ji sir response kijiye sir dekhiye aapki ye hai jab tak aap nahi aapke side se response aayenge sir hum log is pe kaise help out aapko kar sakte hain
Customer: Main abhi response kya dene aapko aur do beja tha subah mein
Executive: Ji abhi main ise close karungi sir to ye na actually aapki do concern raise hogi na sir to ise close karungi to wo concern aapki raise hogi jo ki hume dusri department ko bejhni jati hai fir wo us department wale
Customer: Nehi mujhe bola tha suniye na aapne hi bola tha ki aapko jo dikkat aa rahi hai wo screenshot nikal ke bej dijiye
Executive: Ji aapne bheja usi ke liye to sir wahi screenshot na mujhe bejhni hai usi ke jo bhi hai na related wahi concern raise karni hai sir isliye to main bol rahi hu na ise close ho ha to bas ye ye jo aapki hai na ye main close kar rahi hu aapko feedback mail jayega bas wo aap kar do waha pe aur baki ye main yaha se sort out kara ke aapko de rahi hu sir
Customer: Main aapko pichle panch din se call kar rahi hu sir
Executive: Nahi barabar hai madam aapki lekin kaisa hai ye cheejo humne bahut saal mahino se kar bhi rahe hain response ka kaise baki koi bhi kam rehte na aap subah 9 baje call karte ho 8 baje call karte ho aapke call bahut rehte hain
Customer: Sir dekho main 8 baje karti hu sir lekin aap do do do aapke alava aur kaun mujhe call karte hain ek James bhi karta hai aur ek phone madam hai Minakshi ya wo bhi call karti hai
Executive: Nahi sir dekho ye number aap mere me save karo dekho aapko jo concern hai aap karwa dijiye close theek hai ji totally agreed hai sir ye number aap save karo nahi kar rahe do teen teen log ek cheez ke piche abhi aap batao ki ho gaya dusra aur koi phone karta hai sir ek minute aap se maine valid ki mangi thi sir ab jab tak aap teen char nahi bhejoge sir to wo kya waha se resolve karke denge maine aapko bola tha na sir aap at least do teen mujhe bhejo tabhi wo sort out hongi na aap ek valid mujhe bhej rahe ho sir ek valid me kya uski resolution niklegi aap hi mujhe batao sir tab na main aap se bar bar aapko message kar rahi hu sir do teen at least mujhe send kar do
Customer: To bheja to hai na abhi do jab tak aapne aaj bheja na
Executive: Oh aapne aaj bheja hai subah me sir kal aapne bheja wo delete kar diya tha to main dekhu dekh hi nahi to main uska kya karu batao sir aapne delete kar diya fir call bhi ki thi aapko aapne nahi response kiya sir chalo theek hai main ise abhi ha
Customer: To kya karta hu
Executive: Main yaha se ise kar rahi hu dekho jab tak main khud confirm nahi ho jata na tab tak main aapko kaise share karu
Customer: To theek hai aap koi feedback abhi mat karo yaha pe team jo jab resolve ho jayegi to aap use share kar dena feedback sir theek hai abhi ise close kar rahi hu wo concern jo raise hongi uski main screenshot aapko mail jo jayengi mail ka main aapko photo bhej deti hu uska solution aa jayega aapko aap satisfied ho gaye aap kar dena sir theek hai
Customer: Mail bhi hume CC me rakho na isme
Executive: Mail aapko CC me nahi rakh sakti hu na sir ye hamari department ki hai na sir aapko kaise usme rakh du main theek hai sir main aapko screenshot bhej dungi aap check kar lena na
Customer: Theek hai
Executive: Kya uske usko pehle generate kar do wo ticket sir wo generate ye hamari sir hamari bhi kuch protocol hoti hai na company ki sir ek sath do do concern nahi ho sakti hai na raise sir aapne ticket raise kiya hai chalo aapko pata hai lekin use close jab tak nahi kar sakti hu to use main dusri concern aapke name pe kaise diya close open hogi sir uske liye mujhe at least ye aur iski kafi timing aapne bola tha ek din ka tag timing hai aapko pata hai sab kuch tag ki to sir ye to aap panch cheh sat din hone ko aa gaye sir ab to close ab hamari jo loss honi hai ho hi gayi hai baki ab ise close karti hu
Customer: Ye loss aap dekh rahe ho jo customer ka reason hai
Executive: Theek hai sir wo main sir loss ki dekho customer dekho sir jab aapne open kiya tha first day maine aapko connect kiya hai sir first day ki sir kindly share the buyleads aapne sir share kiya nahi kiya sir dusre din fir maine call kiya aapne nahi bola tha madam suniye buyleads sir maine connect karane ko bola na ki aap me se baat karo kahan kuch mapping me dikkat aa rahi hai kahan aa rahi hai aapne sir kahan bataya ho chuka hai na mapping vagera sab kuch ho chuka hai main account nahi na aap se handle kar rahi hu sir pichle cheh mahine se main mujhe to account do mahine pehle mila hai na main to do mahine se aap se connect hu sir maine kitni bar try bhi kiya aap se baat karne ko aap call nahi response hoga sir fir ab ye problem aayengi to kaise resolve karungi main
Customer: Hmm hmm
Executive: Theek hai aap ye main kar rahi hu aapko screenshot bhej de rahi hu aap properly use dekh lo acche se fir mujhe batana theek hai ab mujhe thoda time do 5 10 minute main kar de rahi hu ye cheez aap day one ko kar dete main usi din ye cheeze ho jati abhi tak resolution aa jati iski
Customer: Theek hai theek hai
Executive: Chalo theek hai sir theek hai fine
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants resolution for pending issues.

- Customer says multiple executives call for same issue.

- Customer says he sent required documents.



Resolution:

- Executive assured resolution and will send screenshot.

- Executive explained the process of raising concerns.

- Executive will sort out the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send screenshot of the mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, resolution, documents, concern
